backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, RBAC-based access control, and contact form submission storage with admin-only retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend well-known files, asset configuration, and related components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend source files and components.
frontend/.env.production.example: Example production environment variables for build metadata used by the frontend’s build indicator.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-driven global styles defining OKLCH color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and preloading the critical hero background image.
frontend/PRODUCTION_CONFIGURATION.md: Documentation describing production admin access, RBAC flow, and contact form spam protection.
frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Guide outlining production deployment steps and draft vs live behavior.
frontend/public/.ic-assets.json: Asset configuration declaring content types and zero-cache settings for two well-known static files.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Two-line domain list for IC domain verification.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Static JSON defining alternative origins for Internet Identity.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION.md: Smoke test checklist for validating production deployment, including landing page, offers, and contact form.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the app's root layout and TanStack Router routes, using lazy-loaded pages with Suspense loaders and multiple admin route aliases.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Renders an admin access screen handling Internet Identity login/logout and showing different UI for unauthenticated or unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/diagnostics/Buil: Displays host, build mode, and build metadata with safe fallbacks and logs environment details to the console.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactF: Implements a validated contact form with bot-detection timing, honeypot, submission handling, and success state UI.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactS: Wraps the contact page layout, showing contact methods and embedding the ContactForm component.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Shows footer links and social icons and embeds the build environment indicator.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Displays the main hero banner with tagline, CTA buttons, and scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Assembles the main landing page, layering a background image behind hero, offers, reviews, contact, and footer sections.
frontend/src/components/landing/OffersSe: Renders a feature grid highlighting tour selling points with links to offer pages.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewCa: Displays a single review with star rating, excerpt, and reviewer info.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewsS: Shows a grid of curated reviews and a TripAdvisor call-to-action button.
frontend/src/components/landing/TripAdvi: Provides a styled external link button to the TripAdvisor reviews page.
frontend/src/components/offers/GetInTouc: CTA link that routes to the homepage and scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/content/countryCallingCodes: Exports a list of country calling code options with labels and metadata.
frontend/src/content/curatedReviews.ts: Defines and exports a list of curated 5‑star customer reviews.
frontend/src/content/offersPosts.ts: Exports structured content for offer-detail pages, including sections and metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance, refreshing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminContactSubmis: Fetches all contact submissions with admin authorization handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Runs a one-time backend connectivity and deployment info check using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Checks whether the authenticated user is an admin using a backend actor and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageSeo.ts: Updates document title, meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter card tags, and optional JSON‑LD based on page-specific SEO config.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollToHashSectio: Scrolls smoothly to the DOM element matching the current URL hash on mount and hash changes.
Handles submitting the contact form via the backend actor with error parsing and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers, color variables, typography, and utility classes for styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Determines admin access, showing loading, access denied, or the submissions admin page based on identity and admin status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ContactSubmissi: Displays and manages contact form submissions with backend health diagnostics, admin access checks, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/diagnostics/DraftVsLi: Diagnostics page showing frontend env data, backend health, and canister info to compare draft vs live deployments.
frontend/src/pages/offers/ChooseYourOwnA: Renders the Choose Your Own Adventure offer article with SEO, content sections, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/FlexibleAsHell: Renders the Flexible As Hell offer article with SEO metadata, structured sections, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/OffTheBeatenPa: Renders the Off The Beaten Path offer article with SEO, content sections, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/PrivateAndPers: Renders the Private and Personal offer article including SEO setup, article body, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/StayYourWayPag: Renders the Stay Your Way offer article with SEO configuration, detailed sections, and a CTA link.
frontend/src/pages/offers/StoriesAndBant: Renders the Stories and Banter offer article featuring SEO data, multiple content sections, and a CTA.
frontend/src/types/recaptcha.d.ts: Placeholder TypeScript declaration file for reCAPTCHA types.
frontend/src/utils/formatTimestamp.ts: Converts a bigint nanosecond timestamp to a formatted US locale date-time string.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugin integrations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and requirements for configuring ICP custom domain verification and related static assets.
